Every day, we scour Amazon to find the best deals available. Whether it's something for your kitchen to make cooking less stressful or top-rated tech to give your smart home an upgrade, the online shopping giant offers some of the best prices on a  very wide range of items. Whatever you need, Amazon has you covered.

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone.  Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting nerds at Reviewed.

Below, you'll find our top 10 Amazon deals right now, including some stylish steak knives, one of our favorite beauty tools and Apple earbuds, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. Need gift ideas? We've got you covered there, too. 

► Holiday Gift Guide 2021:  100 amazing gifts for every type of person and budget

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

The 10 best Amazon deals you can get today

1. Save $15: These beloved Bluetooth item trackers

Never lose your wallet and keys again by picking up the Tile Starter Pack. Normally listed for $54.99, this two-pack of Tile Mate and Tile Slim trackers (they make great gifts this holiday season!) can be yours for $39.99 thanks to a 27% discount. When we tested the latest models of Tile's trackers, we appreciated the different sizes, perfect for attaching to keyrings or slipping into wallets. This model can also be set up through iOS and Android, and louder built-in speakers means you can find the Tile items in even the noisiest environments. 

Get the Tile Bluetooth Tracker Starter 2-Pack for $39.99 (Save $15)

2. Save $70: Some of our favorite earbuds

We think the Apple AirPods Pro are some of the best headphones available right now, and you can get the updated version for one of the lowest prices we've ever seen. We love the Pros for the Active Noise Cancelation that dampened environmental noise and the customizable fit of the buds. This new version adds MagSafe, which means you can hold it near a MagSafe charger and it will snap firmly into place and start charging. Get them now for $179—a $70 price cut from the $249 list price.

Get the Apple AirPods Pro for $179 (Save $70)

3. Less than $50: These stainless steel knives

If you're shopping for gifts for the home chef in your family, put them on the cutting edge with this Zwilling steak knife set. Typically listed for $160, this 8-piece set of stainless steel knives is now available for a whopping 68% discount at $49.99. Zwilling says the knives are made with four-inch serrated blades with tapered grips for a comfortable feel. It also comes in an attractive wooden box for display.

Get the Zwilling Stainless Steel Steak Knife Set of 8 for $49.99 (Save $110.01)

4. 50% off: This multi-functional hair styling tool

Creating salon-quality hairstyles has never been easier with the Revlon One-Step hairdryer and volumizer. This cult-favorite hairstyling tool is one of our favorites (it earned an honorable mention!) and right now you can pick it up from Amazon for as little as $29.99, a $30 markdown. During testing, the volumizer cut our styling time in half and dried our locks from root to tip with minimal effort. 

Get the Revlon One-Step Hair Dryer and Volumizer Hot Air Brush from $29.99 (Save $16.11 to $30)

5. Up to 82% off: These colorful character toys

If you've got loved ones who are big fans of the most colorful characters in pop culture, Amazon has a wide variety of toys on sale today. Star Wars fans will flip for the Funko Pop! Deluxe figure of Princess Leia at Echo Base from The Empire Strikes Back, normally priced at $29.99 but now available for $5.26. Fans of the Spider-Verse can enjoy the Hobby RC Cars Spidey and His Amazing Friends remote control car, which you can get for just $19.74 (21% off its list price of $24.99). There are plenty more options featuring characters from Baby Shark's Big Show!, Fortnite and more. 

Save up to 82% on character toys

6. $35 off: These stylish wireless earbuds

If you've seen Marshall's brand name on the guitar amps of your favorite bands, this is the deal for you. The brand's Mode II earbuds are on sale for $144.86—a 19% discount from its regular price tag of $179.99. The earbuds offer 5 hours of wireless playback on a single charge and the case itself, styled similar to Marshall's beloved amps, lets you get four full recharges at a time. The buds also come with four ear-tip sizes to find the right fit for your ears and are also water-resistant. 

Get the Marshall Mode II True Wireless Earbuds for $144.86 (Save $35.13)

7. 34% off: One of our favorite food storage bags

If you're taking food on the go or just want to keep some snacks fresh, you could do worse than the Stasher Platinum food storage bags. Normally listed for $54.99, you can get a four-pack of these silicone bags for as low as $35.99. We found the Stasher Platinum line to be one of the best reusable sandwich bags thanks to its sturdy silicone build and ability to hold everything from small snacks to even small toiletries. The bags are also good for cooking methods like sous vide and are even oven safe. 

Get the Stasher Platinum Silicone Reusable Storage Bags, 4-Pack from $35.99 (Save $13.75 to $19)

8. 5% off: One of our favorite streaming devices

The 2021 Apple TV 4K is one of our favorite streaming devices and right now it's on sale for as low as $169.98 in its 32-gigabyte capacity, normally listed for $179. We found Apple's little black box to be one of the best streaming devices we've ever tried thanks to its snappy processor, variety of streaming services available to download and support for Dolby Atmos and Dolby Vision. The real ace in its package is its updated remote control that's thicker, easier to control and has a better directional pad to navigate the menu. 

Get the Apple 2021 TV 4K Streaming Device from $169.98 (Save $9.02)

9. 22% off: These compact earbuds

Right now you can get the third-generation Apple AirPods for $139.99—a 22% discount from its $179 list price thanks to a $9.02 discount on the product page and an additional $29.99 price cut at checkout. When we tested the latest models of the AirPods, we were impressed with the sleeker design compared to its older models, more accurate bass and solid instrumental detail you hear in the sound output. You'll get six hours of battery life in each charge and the accompanying charging case has about 24 hours of power when fully charged.

Get the Apple AirPods (3rd Generation) for $139.99 at checkout (Save $39.01)

10. Up to 53% off: These Zippo products

Bring a little light to your everyday routine with Zippo lighters and more on sale at Amazon today. You can get the brand's classic lighter in Street Chrome for $9.77 (40% off its regular price) or get it with a Harley Davidson motor design for $26.36 (53% off its list price). In fact, Harley Davidson fans can complete their purchase with a Zippo lighter pouch with the motorcycle brand's logo for $8.20—a 41% discount from its list price of $13.95. 

Save up to 53% on Zippo products

Amazon deals you may have missed

1. Nuun Sport Electrolyte Drink Tablets 4-Pack

If you need an extra boost to get through the toughest workouts, we suggest adding these Nuun Sport drink tablets to your water. You can get four 10-tablet tubes of citrus berry flavors for $21.35—a $6.61 price cut. Nuun tablets are enhanced with electrolytes and no artificial flavoring or sweeteners. All you have to do is drop a tablet into your preferred drink and let it dissolve to get a flavorful boost for your next run.

Get the Nuun Sport Electrolyte Drink Tablets 4-Pack for $21.35 (Save $6.61)

2. iRobot Roomba 692

Robot vacuums can cost a pretty penny, so it's quite the occasion when a top-rated brand has a model on sale for a hefty discount. The iRobot Roomba 692 is now available for $174.99—a 41% discount from its regular price tag of $299.99. We found this to be a great robovac under $300 thanks to its ability to sense and collect dirt and dust with its dual multi-surface brushes. iRobot says it can also navigate under and around furniture with a battery life of up to 90 minutes. 

Get the iRobot Roomba 692 for $174.99 (Save $125)

3. Kasa Smart Bulb 4-Pack

Lower your electric bill and bring new light to your home with these Kasa smart light bulbs. Normally listed for $44.99, this four-pack of 11-watt bulbs can be brought down to $36.99 thanks to a 17% discount. Kasa says you can set the bulbs to automatically change colors to match natural light patterns throughout the day. You can get that control through the Kasa app on your smartphone or use voice-control interfaces including Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.

Get the Kasa Smart Bulbs 1000 Lumens 4-Pack for $36.99 (Save $8)

4.   Respawn 200 Racing Style Gaming Chair

If you want to truly feel in the driver's seat of your favorite video game, the Respawn 200 chair can give you major comfort at a major discount. Normally $289.99, you can get the black version for as low as $148.17 thanks to a 48% discount. Respawn says the ergonomic design, open-back seat structure, adjustable headrest and pivoting lumbar support all contribute to the chair's comfortability. The developer also says the chair can recline between 90 and 130 degrees with a 360-degree swivel ability.

Get the Respawn 200 Racing Style Gaming Chair from $148.17 (Save $80 to $141.82)

5. Amazon Fire HD 10 Tablet

The best tablets available don't come cheap, but right now you can get one of our favorites for almost half off. Amazon's Fire HD 10 usually starts at $189.99, but you can get one with a 64 gigabyte capacity for 50% off, bringing the price down to $94.99. We ranked the Fire HD 10 as one of the best tablets we've ever tested thanks to its large display, which is capable of playing 1080p-resolution videos with reasonably true colors and black levels, and the relatively quick charging time. Though it doesn't have the strongest app collection compared to the competition from Apple and Google, it's hard to beat its current discounted price.

Get the Amazon Fire HD 10 64 GB Tablet for $94.99 (Save $95)

  • Brita 20-Ounce Stainless Steel Water Filter Bottle from $16.15 (Save $2 to $10.84)
  • SteelSeries Rival 3 Wireless Gaming Mouse for $24.88 (Save $25.11)
  • LifeStraw Personal Water Filter, 2-Pack for $25.98 (Save $13.97)
  • Amazon Echo Dot (4th Generation) for $29.99 (Save $20)
  • 6 Months of Kindle Unlimited for $30 (Save $29.94)
  • Blue Yeti USB Microphone for $89.99 (Save $40)
  • Rockpoint Axess Computer Desk with Keyboard Tray from $111.57 (Save $11.84 to $29.25)
  • Fitbit Charge 5 Fitness Tracker for $129.95 (Save $50)
  • DeWalt 20-Volt Max Cordless Drill Combo Kit for $139 (Save $60)
  • DeskCycle 2 Under Desk Bike Pedal Exerciser for $149 with coupon (Save $50)
  • Keurig K-Supreme Plus Coffee Maker for $169.99 (Save $20)
  • Bose Sleepbuds II for $199 (Save $50)
